query.description: Pass any field and value to search by e.g. `name=John&email=any@aol.com`. Search logic may use LIKE or `=` depending on field.

request.description: Returns a simple count of data in this resource

query.description: Total items to return e.g. `?limit=15`.
Page of items to return e.g. `?page=1`.
Sorting options e.g. `?sort=field1:asc,field2:asc` OR `?sort=latest/oldest`.
Count related models. Alternatively `with_count` e.g. `?count=relation1,relation2`.
Contain data from related model e.g. `?contain=relation1,relation2`.
Pass any field and value to search by e.g. `name=John&email=any@aol.com`. Search logic may use LIKE or `=` depending on field

request.description:
Allows searching for data in this resource using multiple options.

Options for searching
- By field name: e.g. `?name=John` - Specific search
- By field name with `LIKE` operator: e.g. `?name_like=John` - Fuzzy search
- By field name with `!=` operator: e.g. `?age_not=5`
- By field name with `>` or `<` operator: e.g. `?age_gt=5` or `?age_lt=10`
- By field name with `>=` or `<=` operator: e.g. `?age_gte=5` or `?age_lte=10`
- By field name with `IN` or `NOT IN` operator: e.g. `?id_in=1,3,5` or `?id_notIn=2,4`
- By field name with `NULL` or `NOT NULL` operator: e.g. `?email_isNull` or `?email_isNotNull`

query.description: Total items to return e.g. `?limit=15`.
Page of items to return e.g. `?page=1`.
Sorting options e.g. `?sort=field1:asc,field2:asc` OR `?sort=latest/oldest`.
Count related models. Alternatively `with_count` e.g. `?count=relation1,relation2`.
Contain data from related model e.g. `?contain=relation1,relation2`.
Pass any field and value to filter results e.g. `name=John&email=any@aol.com`.

request.description:
Returns a list of items in this resource and allows filtering the data based on fields in the database

Options for searching / filtering
- By field name: e.g. `?name=John` - Specific search
- By field name with `LIKE` operator: e.g. `?name_like=John` - Fuzzy search
- By field name with `!=` operator: e.g. `?age_not=5`
- By field name with `>` or `<` operator: e.g. `?age_gt=5` or `?age_lt=10`
- By field name with `>=` or `<=` operator: e.g. `?age_gte=5` or `?age_lte=10`
- By field name with `IN` or `NOT IN` operator: e.g. `?id_in=1,3,5` or `?id_notIn=2,4`
- By field name with `NULL` or `NOT NULL` operator: e.g. `?email_isNull` or `?email_isNotNull`

query.description: Count related models. Alternatively `with_count` e.g. `?count=relation1,relation2`.
Contain data from related model e.g. `?contain=relation1,relation2`.

request.description:
Create a new record of this resource in the database. You can return related data or counts of related data
in the response using the `count` and `contain` query params

query.description: Count related models. Alternatively `with_count` e.g. `?count=relation1,relation2`.
Contain data from related model e.g. `?contain=relation1,relation2`.

variable.description: The id of the resource to view

request.description:
Returns information about a specific record in this resource. You can return related data or counts of related data
in the response using the `count` and `contain` query params

query.description: Count related models. Alternatively `with_count` e.g. `?count=relation1,relation2`.
Contain data from related model e.g. `?contain=relation1,relation2`.

request.description:
Updates the data of the record with the specified `id`. You can return related data or counts of related data
in the response using the `count` and `contain` query params
Deletes the record with the specified `id`

query.description: Pass any field and value to search by e.g. `name=John&email=any@aol.com`. Search logic may use LIKE or `=` depending on field.

request.description: Returns a simple count of data in this resource

query.description: Total items to return e.g. `?limit=15`.
Page of items to return e.g. `?page=1`.
Sorting options e.g. `?sort=field1:asc,field2:asc` OR `?sort=latest/oldest`.
Count related models. Alternatively `with_count` e.g. `?count=relation1,relation2`.
Contain data from related model e.g. `?contain=relation1,relation2`.
Pass any field and value to search by e.g. `name=John&email=any@aol.com`. Search logic may use LIKE or `=` depending on field

request.description:
Allows searching for data in this resource using multiple options.

Options for searching
- By field name: e.g. `?name=John` - Specific search
- By field name with `LIKE` operator: e.g. `?name_like=John` - Fuzzy search
- By field name with `!=` operator: e.g. `?age_not=5`
- By field name with `>` or `<` operator: e.g. `?age_gt=5` or `?age_lt=10`
- By field name with `>=` or `<=` operator: e.g. `?age_gte=5` or `?age_lte=10`
- By field name with `IN` or `NOT IN` operator: e.g. `?id_in=1,3,5` or `?id_notIn=2,4`
- By field name with `NULL` or `NOT NULL` operator: e.g. `?email_isNull` or `?email_isNotNull`

query.description: Total items to return e.g. `?limit=15`.
Page of items to return e.g. `?page=1`.
Sorting options e.g. `?sort=field1:asc,field2:asc` OR `?sort=latest/oldest`.
Count related models. Alternatively `with_count` e.g. `?count=relation1,relation2`.
Contain data from related model e.g. `?contain=relation1,relation2`.
Pass any field and value to filter results e.g. `name=John&email=any@aol.com`.

request.description:
Returns a list of items in this resource and allows filtering the data based on fields in the database

Options for searching / filtering
- By field name: e.g. `?name=John` - Specific search
- By field name with `LIKE` operator: e.g. `?name_like=John` - Fuzzy search
- By field name with `!=` operator: e.g. `?age_not=5`
- By field name with `>` or `<` operator: e.g. `?age_gt=5` or `?age_lt=10`
- By field name with `>=` or `<=` operator: e.g. `?age_gte=5` or `?age_lte=10`
- By field name with `IN` or `NOT IN` operator: e.g. `?id_in=1,3,5` or `?id_notIn=2,4`
- By field name with `NULL` or `NOT NULL` operator: e.g. `?email_isNull` or `?email_isNotNull`

query.description: Count related models. Alternatively `with_count` e.g. `?count=relation1,relation2`.
Contain data from related model e.g. `?contain=relation1,relation2`.

variable.description: The id of the resource to view

request.description:
Returns information about a specific record in this resource. You can return related data or counts of related data
in the response using the `count` and `contain` query params

response.body: {"data":{"id":2,"name":"Scarlet Morse","description":"Eu quibusdam minus o","phone":"01150064746","whatsapp":"01150064746","address":"Culpa ullamco qui c","google_map":"Duis voluptatem aliq","notes":"Sed nesciunt sit e","email":"dasytek@mailinator.com","facebook":"Natus id qui at porr","behance":null,"twitter":"Autem voluptatem Ip","instagram":"Consequuntur magnam","website":"https:\/\/www.jog.co","cv":null,"created_at":"2025-04-10T14:27:26.000000Z","updated_at":"2025-04-10T14:27:26.000000Z","country_id":null,"city_id":null,"category_id":null,"telegram":null,"youtube":null,"linkedIn":null}}

query.description: Count related models. Alternatively `with_count` e.g. `?count=relation1,relation2`.
Contain data from related model e.g. `?contain=relation1,relation2`.

request.description:
Updates the data of the record with the specified `id`. You can return related data or counts of related data
in the response using the `count` and `contain` query params
Deletes the record with the specified `id`
